short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the Report Image button back to posts where it is otherwise hidden.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple Extension that, when browsing imgur, will reenable the "Report Post" button on all posts, including promoted posts.
